T02TD2721E:87a-1: a'a rya aa mo gha p'a sha manda la de wag nam sto tra bi ma la pra bh'a n'am /
T02TD2721E:87a-3: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs la bstod pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba /
T02TD2721E:87a-4: bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2721E:87a-5: rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings las ma g-yos kyang //
T02TD2721E:87a-6: thugs rje chen pos gdul bya'i snang ngo la //
T02TD2721E:87a-7: gang la gang 'dul de la de ston pa'i //
T02TD2721E:87a-8: 'jig rten dbang phyug khyed la bstod par bgyi //
T02TD2721E:87a-9: 'khor bar gnas kyang skyon gyis ma gos phyir //
T02TD2721E:87a-10: padma dkar po rab rgyas lte ba la //
T02TD2721E:87a-11: thugs rje'i chu rgyun 'bebs mdzad zla ba'i gdan //
T02TD2721E:87a-12: ye shes 'gying tshul bzhugs mdzad khyod la bstod //
T02TD2721E:87a-13: 'jig rten log rtog ston pa 'dul ba'i phyir //
T02TD2721E:87a-14: rgyal po'i rol stabs dbang phyug cha lugs 'dzin //
T02TD2721E:87a-15: sna tshogs thabs mnga' rin chen rgyan gyis spras //
T02TD2721E:87a-16: 'jig rten kun gyis bstod pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2721E:87a-17: don dam chos sku nyag gcig zhal mnga' zhing //
T02TD2721E:87a-18: thugs rjes 'gro la chags pas hr'i: las 'khrungs //
T02TD2721E:87a-19: sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'od dpag med //
T02TD2721E:87a-20: ral pa'i khur na 'chang ba khyod la bstod //
T02TD2721E:87a-21: 'gro drug sgrol phyir ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin //
T02TD2721E:87a-22: rgyal ba'i rgyal po rin chen dbu rgyan can //
T02TD2721E:87a-23: me tog cod pan rgyal sras 'gran zla bral //
T02TD2721E:87b-0: dus @87b gsum rgyal ba'i bdag po khyod la bstod //
T02TD2721E:87b-1: nor bu'i snyan chas 'gro la chos sgra sgrogs //
T02TD2721E:87b-2: spyan gsum dus gsum shes dang shes bya mkhyen //
T02TD2721E:87b-3: 'dzum pa'i zhal mda' 'gro ba'i don la dgyes //
T02TD2721E:87b-4: stong nyid thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2721E:87b-5: kun rdzob tsam du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi //
T02TD2721E:87b-6: nyon mongs kun skyob bde ba'i mchog sbyin cing //
T02TD2721E:87b-7: don dam rnam dag padma dkar po bsnams //
T02TD2721E:87b-8: thabs shes zung 'jug phyag gnyis phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2721E:87b-9: sred pa'i mes gdungs rgyud lnga'i sems can la //
T02TD2721E:87b-10: bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bebs g-yas na spyi blugs 'dzin //
T02TD2721E:87b-11: bdud bzhi'i 'jigs skyob g-yon pa skyabs sbyin mdzad //
T02TD2721E:87b-12: 'khor 'das gnyis med gzigs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2721E:87b-13: srid gsum gzod nas dben par rtogs pa'i phyir //
T02TD2721E:87b-14: ri dgas lpags pas sku yi sham thabs mdzad //
T02TD2721E:87b-15: 'khor 'das rang bzhin spros bral rtogs pa'i phyir //
T02TD2721E:87b-16: gangs ri kunda'i mdangs ldan khyod la bstod //
T02TD2721E:87b-17: khyod kyi thugs rje'i rgyun gyis dus gsum gyi //
T02TD2721E:87b-18: rgyal ba sras bcas 'gro don la bskul nas //
T02TD2721E:87b-19: mdzad bya'i phrin las ma lus mdzad pa'i phyir //
T02TD2721E:87b-20: dkyil 'khor gtso bor bzhugs pa khyod la bstod //
T02TD2721E:87b-21: pha rol phyin bcu'i yon tan rab rdzogs phyir //
T02TD2721E:87b-22: phyag zhabs kun la nor bu'i rgyan gyis spras //
T02TD2721E:87b-23: sa bcu'i stobs rdzogs ye shes mnga' ba'i phyir //
T02TD2721E:87b-24: mu tig do shal 'phyang la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2721E:87b-25: rdzu 'phrul mthu yis 'gro ba drang ba dang //
T02TD2721E:87b-26: stobs bcu'i rtsal gyis bdud dpung gzhom pa'i phyir //
T02TD2721E:87b-27: zhabs gnyis cung zad brkyang bskum rol pas bzhugs //
T02TD2721E:87b-28: rtag par gzhan don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2721E:87b-29: srid pa gsum po dbyings su bsgral ba'i phyir //
T02TD2721E:87b-30: 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ltar 'bar ba'i skus //
T02TD2721E:87b-31: ye shes ral pa'i 'od zer 'gyed mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2721E:87b-32: ma rig mun pa 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2721E:87b-33: gzung 'dzin dri ma dang bral padma'i gdan //
T02TD2721E:87b-34: nyon mongs gdung sel zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02TD2721E:87b-35: 'gro don yengs pa mi mnga'a bzhengs tshul can //
T02TD2721E:87b-36: thugs rje chags pa'i mdog mnga'a khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2721E:87b-37: thabs kyi zhags pas 'gro ba drang ba'i phyir //
T02TD2721E:88a-1: pa'i tshul ston don chen mdzad //
T02TD2721E:88a-2: skye med zhal mnga'a srid gsum gzigs pa'i spyan //
T02TD2721E:88a-3: dbu rgyan rgyal ba'i cod pan 'chang la bstod //
T02TD2721E:88a-4: bden bzhi'i phyag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2721E:88a-5: snying rje'i zhags pas 'gro ba 'dren par mdzad //
T02TD2721E:88a-6: rtogs pa'i rdo rjes log rtog mtshan ma 'joms //
T02TD2721E:88a-7: sgyu ma'i rdzu 'phrul mnga'a ba khyod la bstod //
T02TD2721E:88a-8: mkhyen brtse'i lcags kyus 'khor ba bde bar 'gugs //
T02TD2721E:88a-9: nus ldan bgrang phreng yon tan gter mdzod 'dzin //
T02TD2721E:88a-10: 'gro don mdzod mkhas zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul //
T02TD2721E:88a-11: mtshan don ldan par bzhugs pa khyod la bstod //
T02TD2721E:88a-12: ma chags padma'i rigs te skyon bral steng //
T02TD2721E:88a-13: mkhyen pas nyin mongs tshogs 'joms nyi ma'i gdan //
T02TD2721E:88a-14: bdud dpung mdzoms mdzad khro rgyal h'um las 'khrungs //
T02TD2721E:88a-15: khro bas khro ba 'dul mdzad khyod la bstod //
T02TD2721E:88a-16: rngam pa'i zhul gyis log rtogs dbyings su gsol //
T02TD2721E:88a-17: dmar sel ral pas log 'dren bran du 'dul //
T02TD2721E:88a-18: ye shes spyan gyis khams gsum sku gsum gzigs //
T02TD2721E:88a-19: rta mgrin rta skad sgrogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2721E:88a-20: rdo rje dbyug pas bgegs dpung rdul du rlog / rdo rje sdigs mdzub bdud sde skrag par mdzad //
T02TD2721E:88a-21: gser gyi 'khor los 'khor ba'i rtsab gcod //
T02TD2721E:88a-22: chags bral padma 'chang la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2721E:88a-23: rin chen sprul rgyan klu rgyal gdug pa 'dul //
T02TD2721E:88a-24: glang chen g-yang gzhi stobs bcu mnga'a ba'i dpal //
T02TD2721E:88a-25: stag sham pa tis phrin las rnam bzhi mdzad //
T02TD2721E:88a-26: khro rgyal brkyang bskum bzhugs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2721E:88a-27: skyon bral gdan la rmongs sel nyi ma'i steng //
T02TD2721E:88a-28: pha las 'khrungs pa'i bdud 'dul nag mo che //
T02TD2721E:88a-29: rngam pa'i stabs kyis gdug pa sgrol bar mdzad //
T02TD2721E:88a-30: mche ba gtsigs pas bdud bzhi gsol la bstod //
T02TD2721E:88a-31: rnam thar phyag brgyad ye shes rno ba'i mtshon //
T02TD2721E:88a-32: shes rab ral gris gti mug rtsad nas gcod //
T02TD2721E:88a-33: thugs rje'i zhags bskyon bral padma 'chang //
T02TD2721E:88a-34: thabs mkhas brtse ba'i mda' 'phen khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2721E:88a-35: 'khor los srid pa'i 'khor lo 'joms mdzad cing //
T02TD2721E:88a-36: dbyug pas bgegs 'dul rtse gsum dug gsum gcod //
T02TD2721E:88b-0: spros bral gzhu yis thugs rje'i mda' 'phen @88b ma //
T02TD2721E:88b-1: 'phags lam don ldan ral gcig mal bstod //
T02TD2721E:88b-2: khro rgyal kun 'dus dbu rgyan rin chen 'chang //
T02TD2721E:88b-3: bdud dgra kun 'joms khro mo'i cha lugs rdzogs //
T02TD2721E:88b-4: stag lpags sham thabs stobs bcu'i rtsal mnga'a ba'i //
T02TD2721E:88b-5: rgyal ba kun skyed khro rgyal yum la bstod //
T02TD2721E:88b-6: skyon bral chu skyes gdung ba sel ba'i steng //
T02TD2721E:88b-7: ta las 'khrungs pa'i phrin las kun rdzogs ma //
T02TD2721E:88b-8: brtse ba'i zhal mnga' phrin las rgyas pa'i phyag / ral pa'i cod pan rdo rjes brgyan la bstod //
T02TD2721E:88b-9: thod dbyug bgegs 'dul padmos 'khor ba skyob //
T02TD2721E:88b-10: phreng bas sems can rjes 'dzin 'gro drug la //
T02TD2721E:88b-11: dam chos bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bebs spyi blugs 'dzin //
T02TD2721E:88b-12: sgrub pa po la mchog stsol mdzad la bstod //
T02TD2721E:88b-13: rin chen rgyan 'chang sa dang yon tan rdzogs //
T02TD2721E:88b-14: dar sham ba tis mi 'jigs lha chen 'dul //
T02TD2721E:88b-15: chags can 'dul phyir chags pa ltar ston pa'i //
T02TD2721E:88b-16: lha mo khro gnyer ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2721E:88b-17: kun kyang ye shes 'od dpung klong na bzhugs //
T02TD2721E:88b-18: thabs la mkhas pas sna tshogs cir yang ston //
T02TD2721E:88b-19: nyam thag 'gro la kun tu brtse ba can //
T02TD2721E:88b-20: thugs rjes rtag tu gzigs mdzad khyod la bstod //
T02TD2721E:88b-21: ye shes rol pa chen po'i bdag nyid las //
T02TD2721E:88b-22: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
T02TD2721E:88b-23: sgeg pa'i tshul 'chang bde ba'i mchod 'bul ma //
T02TD2721E:88b-24: sgeg cing bzhad par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2721E:88b-25: byang chub yan lag 'bras bu kun ster bas //
T02TD2721E:88b-26: tshul khrims pha rol phyir pa rab rdzogs phyir //
T02TD2721E:88b-27: rin chen phreng ba 'chang zhing mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2721E:88b-28: chags bral blta bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2721E:88b-29: gzod nas zhi ba'i don la rab mos pas //
T02TD2721E:88b-30: bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
T02TD2721E:88b-31: snyan pa'i glu dbyangs sgrogs shing mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2721E:88b-32: don dam rtogs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2721E:88b-33: rgyal ba mchod par bya phyir skyo ba med //
T02TD2721E:88b-34: brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
T02TD2721E:88b-35: sna tshogs rol pas dgyes pa'i gar mdzad ma //
T02TD2721E:88b-36: mnyes pa'i gzigs mo mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2721E:88b-37: sangs rgyas rgyu 'bras byang chub sems yin pas //
T02TD2721E:88b-38: bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
T02TD2721E:88b-39: yid 'ong me tog rnams kyis mchod mdzad ma //
T02TD2721E:89a-2: thar par 'jug pa dbu mar grub pa dang //
T02TD2721E:89a-3: shes rab pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
T02TD2721E:89a-4: bdug spos sprin tshogs rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod//
T02TD2721E:89a-5: don dam go bar mdzad ma khyod la bstod //
T02TD2721E:89a-6: mi shes mun pa lhag mthong gis 'joms shing //
T02TD2721E:89a-7: thabs mchog pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
T02TD2721E:89a-8: snang ba'i sgron mas kun tu mnyes mdzad ma //
T02TD2721E:89a-9: ma rig mun sel mdzad ma khyod la bstod //
T02TD2721E:89a-10: nyon mongs dri nga rab tu 'joms pa dang //
T02TD2721E:89a-11: smon lam pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir //
T02TD2721E:89a-12: dri mchog byug pas rgyal ba mnyes mdzad ma //
T02TD2721E:89a-13: dri rab bsnams mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2721E:89a-14: snying rje chen pos 'gro ba kun bsdus nas //
T02TD2721E:89a-15: stobs bcu'i sa la kun tu dgod bya'i phyir //
T02TD2721E:89a-16: lcags kyu 'dzin cing zhi ba'i las mdzad ma //
T02TD2721E:89a-17: shar sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2721E:89a-18: byams pa chen pos sdug bsngal kun bsal nas //
T02TD2721E:89a-19: yang dag rig pa'i don la 'god pa'i phyir //
T02TD2721E:89a-20: zhags pa 'dzin cing rgyas pa'i las mdzad ma //
T02TD2721E:89a-21: lho sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2721E:89a-22: dga' ba chen pos 'gro kun bde la 'god //
T02TD2721E:89a-23: srid gsum 'gro ba dbang du bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2721E:89a-24: lcags sgrog bsnams nas dbang gi las mdzad ma //
T02TD2721E:89a-25: nub sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2721E:89a-26: btang snyoms chen pos 'gro kun bdag tu mdzad //
T02TD2721E:89a-27: ma lus sangs rgyas sa la rab 'god phyir//
T02TD2721E:89a-28: dril bu 'chang zhing mngon spyod las mdzad ma //
T02TD2721E:89a-29: byang sgong bzhugs ma khyod la gus pas bstod //
T02TD2721E:89a-30: tshangs pa drag po nyi ma zla ba dang //
T02TD2721E:89a-31: dbang po gshin rje chu lha nor gyi bdag / drang srong srin po rlung dang dbang bdag ste //
T02TD2721E:89a-32: 'jig rten 'dul phyir zhabs drung 'dud mdzad bstod//
T02TD2721E:89a-33: bdag 'dra las kyis mnar ba'i skyo ba yis //
T02TD2721E:89a-34: yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i mgon po yi //
T02TD2721E:89a-35: yon tan cha shas tsam yang ma rig pas //
T02TD2721E:89a-36: khyod kyi mdzad tshul dpag par mi nus mod //
T02TD2721E:89a-37: mun khung nang nas me khyer 'od tsam gyis //
T02TD2721E:89a-38: khyod kyi mthu yis dad pa'i blo thob nas //
T02TD2721E:89a-39: rgya mtsho che las skra rtse'i chu thigs tsam //
T02TD2721E:89a-40: bdag yid spro bas khyod la bstod pa 'dis//
T02TD2721E:89a-41: cung zad tsam rnyed dge ba dri ma med //
T02TD2721E:89b-0: gangs ri ltar dkar shas tsam @89b thob pa des //
T02TD2721E:89b-1: rgyud lnga'i 'gro bas nyes pa kun spangs nas //
T02TD2721E:89b-2: mgon po 'do dpag med pa'i gnas thob shog /'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha bcu bdun la don rtogs kyi sgo nas bstod pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba rdzogs so//
